entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 7:14 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
